title: Pay for a less valuable practice with a more valuable practice
author: joshualinog
excerpt: # Pay for a less valuable practice with a more valuable practice
content:
# Pay for a less valuable practice with a more valuable practice

- [ ] if goal is limited time big goal : do the math on how many instances of a valuable practice are required to accomplish as milestone.
- [ ] if goal is get out of destructive loop : pay a practice tax: do a valuable practice 4- 10 times to exercise a less valuable practice
